mapper.select: SELECT boss_rev_id, form_subm_id, emp_no, boss_no, boss_rev_role, boss_rev_ord_no, isFinal, cre_usr_id, cre_dt, upd_usr_id, upd_dt, del_flg FROM boss_rev WHERE boss_no = #{bossNo} AND form_subm_id = #{formSubmId} AND del_flg = 'F' ORDER BY boss_rev_ord_no, upd_dt DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boss_rev ( form_subm_id, emp_no, boss_no, boss_rev_role, boss_rev_ord_no, isFinal, cre_usr_id, upd_usr_id ) VALUES ( #{formSubmId}, #{empNo}, #{rev.bossEmpNo}, #{rev.bossRevRole}, #{rev.orderNo}, 'F', 'default', 'default' )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM boss_rev WHERE form_subm_id = #{formSubmId} AND emp_no = #{empNo}
